alert.note: Alert for Kiowa; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 6:37PM MDT until July 23 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... Southeastern Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 636 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Sheridan Lake, or 25 miles northeast of Lamar, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Prowers and southeastern Kiowa Counties. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
